sourcesContent:
<template>
  <header-component></header-component>
</template>

<script>
import BootcampComponent from './components/bootcamps/BootcampComponent.vue';
import HeaderComponent from './components/layouts/HeaderComponent.vue';

export default {
  components: {
    BootcampComponent,
    HeaderComponent
  },
  data() {
    return {
      bootcamps: [
        {
          name: 'frontend-bootcamps',
          description: 'a complete frontend bootcamps',
          phone: '0789878719',
          email: 'frontend@gmail.com',
          website: 'http://frontend.com',
          address: 'douai',
        },
        {
          name: 'backend-bootcamps',
          description: 'a complete backend bootcamps',
          phone: '0789878723',
          email: 'backend@gmail.com',
          website: 'http://backend.com',
          address: 'lille',
        },
      ],
    };
  },
  methods: {
    updateBootcamp(email) {
      console.log(email);
      const bootcamp = this.bootcamps.find(
        (bootcamp) => bootcamp.email === email
      );
      console.log(bootcamp);
      alert(`your ${bootcamp.name} bootcamp has been updated successfully`);
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style>
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Montserrat&family=Raleway&display=swap');
h2 {
  font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
}
body {
  font-family: 'Raleway', sans-serif;
}
</style>
